nodes.label: Draw reversible and irreversible changes (ice melting vs. egg cooking)
Sequence: Ice cubes melting into water and freezing back into ice
Depiction: Raw egg cooking into a cooked egg
Understands reversible change: Ice to water and back to ice
Understands irreversible change: Raw egg becomes cooked egg
Missing clarity on irreversible nature of cooked egg
Ensure explanation clarifies cooked egg is irreversible
